content: Hi, I'm Matt, welcome to my site. Here you can find out a little about me and what I've been up to. If you have any questions about myself or this website feel free to contact me via the 'Contact' page.
Aussie Software developer living in Australia, I've recently returned from 10 years abroad.
I've done two technical talks at a user group in Liverpool and one talk at a conference in Germany
I've made one experimental Javascript game so far, but would like to make a solid PhaserJS game soon.
